channel.title: Bf3 is all sorts of wank
channel.description:
want to practice jets? you're all out of luck, not only can you not host your own servers, most servers are configured to only start the game with 8+ people
good job dice, 100% of new players will have 0 experience in a jet and won't have any of the unlocks required for even basic tasks as a jet

item.title: Bf3 is all sorts of wank
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

Turn at airspeed 290-300. I believe that’s optimum for turning.

Use Flares, Air radar and unguided rockets. Also never step foot in an F-35

Read full topic

is it just me or is sniping incredibly nerfed in this game? I die more to people with an m249 at 400+ metres than I die to enemy bloody snipers

item.title: Bf3 is all sorts of wank
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Aim a fair bit ahead of them. Bullet drop + them moving contributes quite a bit, also use the air brake to turn quicker so if they’re trying to turn away from you, you can stay behind and still be able to hit them.

Read full topic

item.title: Bf3 is all sorts of wank
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“Brolapse, post:25, topic:421722”][quote author=tL link=topic=524379.msg3842911#msg3842911 date=1323386800]
[23:23:11] tL: woo
[23:23:15] tL: got my service star with the jet
[23:24:39] tL: 106 jet kills, 143 vehiciles destroyed with jets
[23:24:54] tL: unlcoked everything for the jets

I play this game for the jets bro. Jet pilot mastery + jet pilot proficiency dog tags is how I roll.
[/quote]
Do you use a stick or a gamepad?[/quote]
I tried a stick, didn’t go so well. Gamepad for bf3 would probably be a lot better

item.title: Bf3 is all sorts of wank
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

bump, just realised throttle down doesn’t work unless it’s bound to S hence my first 5 hours of jet gameplay have been at 350-450 kph, trying to do anything at this speed is ridiculous

item.source: Bf3 is all sorts of wank

item.title: Bf3 is all sorts of wank
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

The best place to first level jets is on Kharg Rush Defending. You can see the tanks slowly moving through the water and one or two good passes of machine gunning them should blow them up. That, and the helicopter doesn’t have a large area of ground to cover so they’ll usually come in shoot it up and then go back out to the boat to repair. You can shoot them down easily.

Read full topic
item.source: Bf3 is all sorts of wank

item.title: Bf3 is all sorts of wank
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

managed to rake up an hour and a half in jets, 0 kills and I don’t have the first unlock yet, which happens to be ir flares which are essential to play

anyone got tips besides getting a gamepad? ps I’m using this control scheme and can last long enough until I get shot down by rockets at 900+ altitude going 400+ mph

EDIT: managed to get a few kills, just a fyi but flying into things with jets is absolutely useless, I even flew into a guy parachuting, hit him and didn’t kill him!

Read full topic

making it damn near impossible to do anything other than flying at top speed near the flight ceiling

item.source: Bf3 is all sorts of wank

item.title: Bf3 is all sorts of wank
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Ollie:

EA has pretty much lost it, they don’t know what people want any more. How can a ridiculous game like farmville have more money than the whole of EA? Shows how shit the gaming industry can be.

Because EA and Activision take existing ORIGINAL games and see financial opportunity, which causes them to pressure developers to apply to a larger demographic, and in the process ruin what was original about it in the first place.

Read full topic

item.title: Bf3 is all sorts of wank
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

on caspien when on final base, when defending. set c4 charges on their helicopter wait for the team / squad to spawn in it and blow up. mega points, can do it for the tanks and stuff too most i got was 1.2k points from one setting off of the c4

Read full topic
item.source: Bf3 is all sorts of wank

item.title: Bf3 is all sorts of wank
item.dc:creator: @wyn10 wyn10
item.description:
@wyn10 wrote:

Ea is drowning Dice.

Why Dice why.

I blow up idiots in tanks that can’t use a tank properly. I can’t stand when I get a guy jumps in to be gunner; fucking spray’s at nothing and give off my position everytime. I also really hate when I’m repairing and some guy on my team hi-jacks my tank. Thanks faggot.

Without a gunner I’ve managed to run away from two tanks and flank them on Caspien.

Read full topic

item.title: Bf3 is all sorts of wank
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

tL:

You can rent out a server from an official provider and configure it how you like, including the players required to start. But that still isn’t great…

Ridiculous! I was hoping to buy the game to play at my next LAN party, guess that’s out of the question now. Looks like I really am completely done buying EA games.

Read full topic
item.source: Bf3 is all sorts of wank

item.title: Bf3 is all sorts of wank
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

sounds like the same old battlefield to me… “GIMME FUCKING PLANES OR I NADE THEM ALL BEFORE YOU GET OFF THE GROUND”

it’s exactly like that, there was a free jet on a game I was playing earlier and no one took it for a while so I hopped in and immediately got teamkilled by someone who obviously wanted it, and he managed to crash and burn before getting off the runway

but the problem I’m having isn’t necessarily getting the jets, it’s actually getting some practice and being able to use them, you don’t get flares to start so avoiding missiles is bad enough but then you have 2 enemy jets which in my experience usually have much better unlocks making it damn near impossible to do anything other than flying at top speed near the flight ceiling

Moparisthebest:

A battlefield game where you can’t host your own server? Seriously?

as thug said the only thing you can do is rent a server from an official host but that’s absolutely appalling especially since you can’t play LAN and have to PAY to play a multiplayer game with just friends

that said though it does provide some consistency, I was playing a 64 player game in Germany with only 20 ping, I’m hard pressed to find 20 ping on 32 player games of tf2 hosted in the UK!

Read full topic
